item.title: DeSW
item.description: A shared wallet server, for maintaining a centralized ledger of accounts. Accounts can transfer amounts to each other, deposit and withdraw. Currently supports Bitcoin and Dash.

item.title: Trade Manager
item.description: An asynchronous program for managing cryptocurrency trading on a variety of exchanges. This program comes with a number of optional, configurable plugins, including bitt, Kraken, Bitfinex, and Poloniex.
